import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; import swal from "sweetalert2"; import $ from "jquery"; import Header from "./common/Header"; import Sidebar from "./common/Sidebar"; export class SingleHome extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { home: [], }; } componentDidMount() { var id = window.location.href.split("/")[ window.location.href.split("/").length - 1 ]; // console.log(id); axios .get(`${axios.defaults.baseURL}/view-home/${id}`) .then((response) => { console.log(response); return response; }) .then((json) => { if (json.data.success) { this.setState({ home: json.data.home, }); } else { console.log(`Cannot fetch data!`); } }) .catch((error) => { console.error(`An Error Occured! ${error}`); }); } tAndC(event) { swal.fire({ title: 'Terms & Conditions', html: '

These terms and conditions ("Terms", "Agreement") are an agreement between Realvest Global Technologies Limited RC 1634584 ("Realvest", "us", "we" or "our") and you ("User", "you" or "your"). This Agreement sets forth the general terms and conditions of your use of the realvest.ng website and any of its products or services (collectively, "Website" or "Services

") ', showCloseButton: true, showCancelButton: true, focusConfirm: false, cancelButtonText: 'Disagree', confirmButtonText: ' Agree!', }) }; render() { return (

Back to Homes Listing {this.state.home.map((home) => ( <>

{home.name} - {home.type} Installment Plan

{home.description}

{/*
*/}
Preferred Name on Document
Number of Units
Read Terms & Conditions
))}
); } } export default SingleHome;
